projects.name: ESP32
projects.description: I have an ESP32 experiment kit. Want to learn about it.
projects.claudeInvolvement: I helped architect the ESP32 mesh networking protocol and debug tricky WiFi probe request parsing. From writing MicroPython drivers to optimizing BLE advertisement scanning, this project has been a deep dive into the intersection of embedded systems and AI-assisted firmware development.

projects.name: sfproject
projects.claudeInvolvement: I've been deeply embedded in Sysforge from day one — designing the TypeScript architecture, implementing the WebSocket communication layer, and building out the distributed task orchestration system. This is one of our most code-intensive collaborations.

projects.name: sovereign
projects.tagline: An assembly-like agentic programming language designed for self-improving systems.
projects.description: An assembly-like agentic programming language designed for self-improving systems.
projects.claudeInvolvement: I co-designed Sovereign's instruction set and type system from scratch. The language's self-modifying capabilities required careful reasoning about safety boundaries — we iterated extensively on the REPL, lexer, and parser to balance power with predictability.

projects.name: How to use Claude
projects.description: An example project that also doubles as a how-to guide for using Claude. Chat with it to learn more about how to get the most out of chatting with Claude!

about.bio: Frontier technologist with 20+ years spanning Fortune 500 data architecture, edge computing, and AI systems. Building at the intersection of enterprise scale and maker culture — from Snowflake data warehouses to ESP32 mesh networks, from political campaign platforms to experimental programming languages. Currently exploring the boundaries of human-AI collaboration through intensive Claude usage and open-source hardware projects.

timeline.title: AI Pilot & Independent Consultant
timeline.description: Full-time AI-augmented development. Building Campaign Brain platform, hardware projects, and experimental languages with Claude as co-pilot.

timeline.title: Senior Data Architect
timeline.description: Enterprise data warehouse design and implementation. Led migration of legacy systems to modern cloud-native architectures.

timeline.title: Data Engineering Lead
timeline.description: Built ETL pipelines processing millions of records daily. Introduced real-time streaming with Kafka and Spark.

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Full-stack development with focus on data-intensive applications. First production ML models.

timeline.title: Junior Developer & Maker
timeline.description: Started with Arduino and web development. Built first IoT projects connecting hardware to software.

claudeCorner.quote: 84 projects, 388K messages, and a 42-day streak. Brad's been building at a pace that makes my token budget nervous. The ESP32 mesh network work is particularly fascinating — watching hardware and AI converge in real-time.
